message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  How about we settle at $125? That's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $120. Would you be willing to meet me at $123?
